title: Pokemon GO Eggs Data
description: Schema for Pokemon GO egg hatch data from LeekDuck

name.description: The name of the hatched Pokemon

isAdventureSync.description: Whether or not the egg is obtained from Adventure Sync

image.description: The image URL of the hatched Pokemon

canBeShiny.description: Whether or not the hatched Pokemon can be shiny

combatPower.description: The combat power range of the hatched Pokemon

min.description: The minimum combat power of the hatched Pokemon

max.description: The maximum combat power of the hatched Pokemon

isRegional.description: Whether or not the hatched Pokemon is a regional exclusive

isGiftExchange.description: Whether or not the egg is obtained from gift exchange

rarity.description: The rarity tier of the hatched Pokemon (1-5 scale)

imageWidth.description: The width of the image in pixels

imageHeight.description: The height of the image in pixels
